snippet: The Navy has been accompanying United States-flagged ships through the strait in response to last week’s detention of the MV Maersk Tigris by Iranian Revolutionary Guards patrol boats.
lead_paragraph: The Navy has been accompanying United States-flagged ships through the strait in response to last week’s detention of the MV Maersk Tigris by Iranian Revolutionary Guards patrol boats.

headline.main: Iran: U.S. Navy Escorting British Ships Through Strait After Detention Dispute
headline.print_headline: Iran: U.S. Navy Escorting British Ships Through Strait After Detention Dispute

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
